record.problems:
'marked' stands for respectful register, scornful register, and register of the 'doany' medium
37. to eat: default forms are mi-hìna, h<om>a
record.classification: Austronesian, Malayo-Polynesian, Greater Barito, East, Malagasy

record.annotation: defining term for SW Malagasy dialects
t- unexpected but poss. due to homonymic clash with 'fire'
ultimately < Malay but important for classification SW dialect group
